questions.question: WE'RE NOT SURE WHEN, BUT AT LEAST WE KNOW THAT RIVERS OF LIGHT WILL BE SHOWN IN THIS PARK.

questions.question: THIS TV ACTOR WHO PLAYED UNCLE JESSE HAS THE D FROM THE ORIGINAL DISNEYLAND SIGN IN HIS BACKYARD.
AFTER HIS STINT IN THE MAKING OF ME, THIS ACTOR THEN APPEARED IN THE ATTRACTION IN HIS NATIVE COUNTRY.
THE PAPERS TO BREAK UP THE BEATLES WERE SIGNED IN THIS RESORT IN 1974.
THIS ACTOR WHO LIVED TO BE 100 GAVE A COMEDIC SPEECH AT THE OPENING OF WALT DISNEY WORLD
HE PLAYED DAVID LETTERMAN IN HBO'S "THE LATE SHIFT" AND TOM'S FAVORITE, BILL MCKIM, IN THE ORIGINAL TEST TRACK PRESHOW
THE PARTNERS STATUE CAN BE FOUND "AROUND" THIS CENTRAL AREA OF THE MAGIC KINGDOM.
EARLY SKETCHES HAD WALT HOLDING THE ROLLED UP PLANS FOR THIS MAJOR PROJECT.
WALT IS WEARING A CLADDAGH RING WHICH HE AND HIS WIFE GOT ON THEIR VISIT TO THIS COUNTRY.
THE STATUE OF WALT IS ACTUALLY TALLER THAN WALT IN REAL LIFE BY THIS MANY INCHES.
THIS DISNEY LEGEND IS THE SCULPTOR OF THE PARTNERS STATUE.
ALTHOUGH IT LOOKS OUT OF PLACE, SID CAHUENGA'S CAN BE FOUND IN THIS PARK AT WALT DISNEY WORLD.
NOWADAYS, SID CAHUENGA'S FUNCTIONS AS A SERVICE CENTER FOR THESE.
IN EARLIER DAYS, SID CAHUENGA'S USED TO SELL THESE.
THE NAME SID WAS TAKEN FROM FIRST NAME OF THE OWNER OF THIS HOLYWOOD ICON WHICH ALSO HAPPENS TO BE AT THE SAME PARK.
LOOK IN THE TRUCK IN THE BACK AND YOU CAN SEE A FIGURE FROM THIS FORMER MAGIC KINGDOM ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea?

questions.question: THE NAME OF THIS RIDE IN DINORAMA IS AN HOMAGE TO WALT DISNEY'S ORIGINAL DINOSAUR DIORAMA.
CHESTER AND HESTER'S WAS ORIGINALLY THE ONLY ONE OF THESE FOR MILES.
CHESTER AND HESTER WERE THIS KIND OF ASSOCIATES.
CHESTER AND HESTER'S AND THE DINO INSTITUTE ARE SET IN THIS FICTIONAL COUNTY.
CHESTER AND HESTER'S IS LOCATED ON THIS FICTIONAL ROUTE, AN HOMAGE TO THE OPENING OF THE PARK.
DON'T CALL IT A GOLF BALL! SPACESHIP EARTH IS MOST ACCURATELY CALLED THIS.
BEFORE WE THANKED THE PHOENICIANS, SPACESHIP EARTH WAS NARRATED BY THIS ACTOR.
GUTTERS COLLECT THE RAIN THAT FALLS ON SPACESHIP EARTH AND FUNNEL IT INTO THIS BODY OF WATER.
